job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pWere looking for a Data Scientist to join a company in the Underdogio networkppbrppThe Underdogio network is a curated group of some of the fastest growing startups and tech companies in the country We actively turn away more than 50 of companies that attempt to joinppbrppWe accept companies that offer competitive salaries benefits and perks Theyre working on interesting technical challenges and must be respectful of your time to stay activeppbrppOur companies look for Data Scientists who are comfortable working with large data sets using SQL Hadoop MapReduce Hive etc They have an understanding of programming concepts and experience with programming languages such as Python Java Scala R MATLAB C and others Many of our companies are looking for midtosenior level talent both individual contributors and managersppbrppTo apply to the network well ask you to fill out a 60second web form Its absolutely freeppbrppIf accepted youll hear directly from founders hiring managers and other key decision makers starting the following Monday Our platform will hide your profile from your current employerppbrppApply todayppbrppppbrppstrongBuilding an inclusive and diverse workplace is one of Underdogios core values We warmly welcome people of all backgrounds experiences and perspectivesstrongp
